markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Obfuscation Oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2932)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Oil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=663" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can spread this blue-gray gel on a single item with a Bulk of 3 or less to ward it against magical detection. It becomes undetectable to detection, revelation, and scrying magic of 8th rank or lower (such as [_locate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=173)). This oil is permanent, but it can be removed with acid. Removing the oil in this way usually takes 1 minute for objects with Bulk of 1 or less, or a number of minutes equal to the item's Bulk.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Obfuscation Oil

text: <title level="1" right="Item 15" pfs="Standard" > Obfuscation Oil Source GM Core pg. 257 2.0 Price 1,200 gp Usage held in 2 hands Bulk L Activate Single Action (manipulate) --- You can spread this blue-gray gel on a single item with a Bulk of 3 or less to ward it against magical detection. It becomes undetectable to detection, revelation, and scrying magic of 8th rank or lower (such as locate ). This oil is permanent, but it can be removed with acid. Removing the oil in this way usually takes 1 minute for objects with Bulk of 1 or less, or a number of minutes equal to the item's Bulk.
